column4: I was running the updates on my Hardy system here and I get a warning message about /etc/gnome/defaults.list and I would like if someone could help me to make the right choice here.  http://pastebin.com/d2fbea57f
my guess would be to say okay, but not really sure
yeah, and backing up your old sources.list is not a bad idea :)
it looks like it includes some default desktop settings, like program associations for audio-cdda or dvd, usually its best to have the most current version
